All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CommentClient
Feign client interface for interacting with the Comment Service.
CommentCreateEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to comment creation in the system.
CommentLikeCreatedEventImpl
Handles events related to the creation of likes on comments.
CreateNotificationDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for creating a notification.
GetNotificationDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for retrieving notification details.
KafkaConfig
Configuration class for Kafka integration within the application.
LoggingAspect
Aspect for centralized logging of application methods.
MediaDeletedEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the deletion of media files.
MediaUploadEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the upload of media files.
NonRetryableException
Represents an exception that is non-retryable.
Notification
Represents a notification entity in the system.
NotificationController
 
NotificationDTO
Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a notification.
NotificationNotFoundException
Represents an exception that is thrown when a notification is not found.
NotificationRepository
Repository for accessing and managing notifications in the database.
NotificationService
Service class for managing notification-related operations.
NotificationServiceApplication
Entry point for the Notification Service Application.
NotificationServiceInterface
Interface for managing notification-related operations.
PostClient
Feign client interface for interacting with the Post Service.
PostCreatedEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the creation of posts.
PostDeletedEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the deletion of posts.
PostLikeCreateEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to likes on posts.
PostUpdatedEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to updates on posts.
RedisConfig
Configuration class for Redis caching.
RetryableException
Represents an exception that is retryable.
SubscriptionCreateEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the creation of new subscriptions (followers).
SubscriptionDeletedEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to the deletion of subscriptions (unsubscriptions).
SwaggerConfig
Configuration class for Swagger API documentation.
UserClient
Feign client interface for interacting with the User Service.
UserCreateEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to user creation.
UserDeletedEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to user deletion.
UserUpdateEventHandlerImpl
Handles events related to user updates.
